explanation: To determine whether can_compress participates in direct or indirect recursion we must inspect the bodies of the functions it calls (and their callees) to see if any call path returns to can_compress. 1) MHD_lookup_connection_value — can_compress calls this function directly; its implementation may call back into can_compress (directly or via other functions), so its source is required. 2) MHD_lookup_connection_value_n — listed as a callee of MHD_lookup_connection_value; you must inspect it (and any functions it calls transitively) to ensure there is no path back to can_compress. Note: if, during analysis, additional callees of these functions are discovered, those functions must also be examined for potential paths back to can_compress.
